PushSubscriptionOptionsApplicationServer.summary: The applicationServerKey read-only property of the interface contains the public key used by the push server.
PushSubscriptionOptionsApplicationServer.value: A public key your push server uses to send messages to client apps via a push server. This value is part of a signing key pair generated by your application server, and usable with elliptic curve digital signature (ECDSA), over the P-256 curve.
